Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
In case you missed it, this is your last chance to register for tomorrow's webinar: Self-Managing Kubernetes.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-ai-to-optimize-kubernetes-clusters/]]>
Join our live webinar on May 30th at 11am ET <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/using-ai-to-optimize-kubernetes-clusters/]]>to learn how customers are continuously and automatically optimizing their Kubernetes clusters.
We look forward to seeing you there!
Regards, Team Turbonomic © Turbonomic, Inc.
